variable.name: NEE_C
description: Annual net ecosystem exchange of CO2 between ecosystem, commonly measured using eddy-covariance. Sign convention: negative indicates C uptake
variable.mapping.notes: Mapping assumes NEE = -NEP; i.e., minimal vertical advection, respiration-derived dissolved inorganic carbon, and non-repiratory CO2 fluxes (see Chapin et al. 2006)
notes: *Equation assumes minimal vertical advection, respiration-derived dissolved inorganic carbon, and non-repiratory CO2 fluxes (e.g., from fire or ultraviolet oxidation of organic matter); see Chapin et al. 2006

variable.name: NEE_cum_C
description: Cumulative net ecosystem exchange over a specified time frame (measured using eddy-covariance or gas exchange in a closed chamber). Sign convention: negative indicates C uptake
variable.mapping.notes: Mapping assumes NEE = -NEP; i.e., minimal vertical advection, respiration-derived dissolved inorganic carbon, and non-repiratory CO2 fluxes (see Chapin et al. 2006)
notes: Applies to timeframes other than one year. Meaninful only in conjunction with start and end date.

variable.name: NEP_C
description: Net ecosystem production estimated biometrically / from ground-based measurements
variable.mapping.notes: Mapping assumes NEE = -NEP; i.e., minimal vertical advection, respiration-derived dissolved inorganic carbon, and non-repiratory CO2 fluxes (see Chapin et al. 2006)
notes: Covariates will depend on methodology. Currently not acquired for any records in the database.

variable.name: GPP_C
description: Annual gross primary production, commonly estimated through flux partitioning of eddy covariance. A.k.a. "Gross Ecosystem Production".
equations: (1)* GPP_C = R_eco_C - NEE_C; (2)** GPP_C = NPP_5_C + R_auto_C
notes: *Equation 1 assumes minimal vertical advection, respiration-derived dissolved inorganic carbon, and non-repiratory CO2 fluxes (e.g., from fire or ultraviolet oxidation of organic matter); see Chapin et al. 2006. **Equation 2 assumes no net change in non-structural carbohydrate storage.

variable.name: GPP_cum_C
description: Cumulative GPP over a specified time frame. Sign convention: positive.
notes: Applies to timeframes other than one year. Meaninful only in conjunction with start and end date.

variable.name: TBCF_C
description: Total belowground C flux (through roots)
notes: *equation applies only if ANPP_2_C is throughly quantified, including all aboveground components

variable.name: NPP_1_OM
description: NPP, including foliage, branch, stem, coarse root, and fine root.
equations: NPP_1_OM = ANPP_foliage_OM + (ANPP_woody_stem_OM + ANPP_woody_branch_OM) + BNPP_coarse root_OM + BNPP_fine root_OM
variable.mapping.notes: NPP must include tree (10cm DBH+) stem, branch, roots, and foliage. May include trees <10cm DBH, understory, reproduction, herbivory, root exudation, and VOCs.
data.filter: Exclude min.dbh >10.  (Do not exclude min.dbh NAC.)

variable.name: NPP_1_C
description: NPP, including foliage, branch, stem, coarse root, and fine root.
equations: NPP_1_C = ANPP_foliage_C + (ANPP_woody_stem_C + ANPP_woody_branch_C) + BNPP_coarse root_C + BNPP_fine root_C
variable.mapping.notes: NPP must include tree (10cm DBH+) stem, branch, roots, and foliage. May include trees <10cm DBH, understory, reproduction, herbivory, root exudation, and VOCs.
data.filter: Exclude min.dbh >10.  (Do not exclude min.dbh NAC.)

variable.name: NPP_2_OM
description: NPP, including foliage, branch, stem, coarse root, fine root, and understory.
variable.mapping.notes: NPP must include tree (10cm DBH+) stem, branch, roots, and foliage. May include trees <10cm DBH, understory, reproduction, herbivory, root exudation, and VOCs.
data.filter: Exclude min.dbh >10.  (Do not exclude min.dbh NAC.)

variable.name: NPP_2_C
description: NPP, including foliage, branch, stem, coarse root, fine root, and understory.
variable.mapping.notes: NPP must include tree (10cm DBH+) stem, branch, roots, and foliage. May include trees <10cm DBH, understory, reproduction, herbivory, root exudation, and VOCs.
data.filter: Exclude min.dbh >10.  (Do not exclude min.dbh NAC.)

variable.name: NPP_3_OM
description: NPP, including foliage, branch, stem, coarse root, fine root, understory and reproductive NPP.
variable.mapping.notes: NPP must include tree (10cm DBH+) stem, branch, roots, and foliage. May include trees <10cm DBH, understory, reproduction, herbivory, root exudation, and VOCs.
data.filter: Exclude min.dbh >10.  (Do not exclude min.dbh NAC.)

variable.name: NPP_3_C
description: NPP, including foliage, branch, stem, coarse root, fine root, understory and reproductive NPP.
variable.mapping.notes: NPP must include tree (10cm DBH+) stem, branch, roots, and foliage. May include trees <10cm DBH, understory, reproduction, herbivory, root exudation, and VOCs.
data.filter: Exclude min.dbh >10.  (Do not exclude min.dbh NAC.)

variable.name: NPP_4_OM
description: NPP, including foliage, branch, stem, coarse root, fine root, understory, reproductive and herbivory.
variable.mapping.notes: NPP must include tree (10cm DBH+) stem, branch, roots, and foliage. May include trees <10cm DBH, understory, reproduction, herbivory, root exudation, and VOCs.
data.filter: Exclude min.dbh >10.  (Do not exclude min.dbh NAC.)

variable.name: NPP_4_C
description: NPP, including foliage, branch, stem, coarse root, fine root, understory, reproductive and herbivory.
variable.mapping.notes: NPP must include tree (10cm DBH+) stem, branch, roots, and foliage. May include trees <10cm DBH, understory, reproduction, herbivory, root exudation, and VOCs.
data.filter: Exclude min.dbh >10.  (Do not exclude min.dbh NAC.)

variable.name: NPP_5_OM
description: Total NPP, including foliage, branch, stem, coarse root, fine root, understory, reproductive, herbivory, VOC and exudation.
variable.mapping.notes: NPP must include tree (10cm DBH+) stem, branch, roots, and foliage. May include trees <10cm DBH, understory, reproduction, herbivory, root exudation, and VOCs.
data.filter: Exclude min.dbh >10.  (Do not exclude min.dbh NAC.)

variable.name: NPP_5_C
description: Total NPP, including foliage, branch, stem, coarse root, fine root, understory, reproductive, herbivory, VOC and exudation.
variable.mapping.notes: NPP must include tree (10cm DBH+) stem, branch, roots, and foliage. May include trees <10cm DBH, understory, reproduction, herbivory, root exudation, and VOCs.
data.filter: Exclude min.dbh >10.  (Do not exclude min.dbh NAC.)

variable.name: NPP_woody_OM
description: Woody NPP: annual increments in live woody biomass (branch, stem, coarse root) estimated using allometric equations.

variable.name: NPP_woody_C
description: Woody NPP: annual increments in live woody biomass C (branch, stem, coarse root) estimated using allometric equations.

variable.name: NPP_understory_OM
description: Total understory NPP. Components included may vary.
variable.mapping.notes: not mapped- usually small flux (most <1 Mg C ha-1 yr-1), relatively few records

variable.name: NPP_understory_C
description: Total understory NPP. Components included may vary.
variable.mapping.notes: not mapped- usually small flux (most <1 Mg C ha-1 yr-1), relatively few records

variable.name: ANPP_0_OM
description: Annual aboveground NPP, where components included are unknown/do not fit the definition of ANPP_1_OM / ANPP_2_OM
variable.mapping.notes: ANPP must include tree (10cm DBH+) stem growth and litterfall. May include trees <10cm DBH, understory,  branch turnover, reproduction, herbivory, and VOCs.
data.filter: Exclude min.dbh >10.  (Do not exclude min.dbh NAC.)

variable.name: ANPP_0_C
description: Annual aboveground NPP, where components included are unknown/do not fit the definition of ANPP_1_OM / ANPP_2_OM
variable.mapping.notes: ANPP must include tree (10cm DBH+) stem growth and litterfall. May include trees <10cm DBH, understory,  branch turnover, reproduction, herbivory, and VOCs.
data.filter: Exclude min.dbh >10.  (Do not exclude min.dbh NAC.)

variable.name: ANPP_1_OM
description: Annual aboveground NPP, including foliage and stem growth
variable.mapping.notes: ANPP must include tree (10cm DBH+) stem growth and litterfall. May include trees <10cm DBH, understory,  branch turnover, reproduction, herbivory, and VOCs.
data.filter: Exclude min.dbh >10.  (Do not exclude min.dbh NAC.)

variable.name: ANPP_1_C
description: Annual aboveground NPP, including foliage and stem growth
variable.mapping.notes: ANPP must include tree (10cm DBH+) stem growth and litterfall. May include trees <10cm DBH, understory,  branch turnover, reproduction, herbivory, and VOCs.
data.filter: Exclude min.dbh >10.  (Do not exclude min.dbh NAC.)

variable.name: ANPP_2_OM
description: Annual aboveground NPP, including foliage, stem growth, and branch turnover
equations: (1) ANPP_2_OM = ANPP_foliage_OM + ANPP_woody_stem_OM + ANPP_woody_branch_OM; (2) ANPP_2_OM = ANPP_foliage_OM + ANPP_woody_OM
variable.mapping.notes: ANPP must include tree (10cm DBH+) stem growth and litterfall. May include trees <10cm DBH, understory,  branch turnover, reproduction, herbivory, and VOCs.
data.filter: Exclude min.dbh >10.  (Do not exclude min.dbh NAC.)

variable.name: ANPP_2_C
description: Annual aboveground NPP, including foliage, stem growth, and branch turnover
equations: (1) ANPP_2_C = ANPP_foliage_C + ANPP_woody_stem_C + ANPP_woody_branch_C; (2) ANPP_2_C = ANPP_foliage_C + ANPP_woody_C
variable.mapping.notes: ANPP must include tree (10cm DBH+) stem growth and litterfall. May include trees <10cm DBH, understory,  branch turnover, reproduction, herbivory, and VOCs.
data.filter: Exclude min.dbh >10.  (Do not exclude min.dbh NAC.)

variable.name: ANPP_woody_OM
description: Annual aboveground woody production, including stem growth and branch turnover

variable.name: ANPP_woody_C
description: Annual aboveground woody production, including stem growth and branch turnover

variable.name: ANPP_woody_stem_OM
description: Annual stem ANPP; i.e., annual wood (including branch) increment determined using allometric equations relating aboveground woody biomass increment to changes in stem diameter of all individual trees in the plot

variable.name: ANPP_woody_stem_C
description: Annual stem ANPP; i.e., annual wood (including branch) increment determined using allometric equations relating aboveground woody biomass increment to changes in stem diameter of all individual trees in the plot

variable.name: ANPP_woody_branch_OM
description: Annual branch turnover, typically determined by collecting branch fall throughout the year.

variable.name: ANPP_woody_branch_C
description: Annual branch turnover, typically determined by collecting branch fall throughout the year.
notes: Allometric equation recorded as covariate for some records.

variable.name: ANPP_foliage_OM
description: Annual foliage production, typically estimated by collecting leaf/needle fall throughout the year, but correcting for changes in leaf biomass when measured.
equations: ANPP_foliage_OM = (total leaf production) - ANPP_folivory_OM + (change in biomass_ag_foliage_OM)
notes: Estimation methods vary, and some covariates are recorded as appropriate. Note that if there is any net change in foliage biomass during the measurement period, ANPP_foliage_OM estimates based on leaf fall that do not correct for changes in foliage biomass do not accurately represent C allocation to foliage production. Note also that unless methods correct for consumption of foliage by herbivores, this measurement excludes leaf production that is consumed by herbivores.

variable.name: ANPP_foliage_C
description: Annual foliage production, typically estimated by collecting leaf/needle fall throughout the year, but correcting for changes in leaf biomass when measured.
equations: ANPP_foliage_C = (total leaf production) - ANPP_folivory_C + (change in biomass_ag_foliage_C)
notes: Estimation methods vary, and some covariates are recorded as appropriate. Note that if there is any net change in foliage biomass during the measurement period, ANPP_foliage_OM estimates based on leaf fall that do not correct for changes in foliage biomass do not accurately represent C allocation to foliage production. Note also that unless methods correct for consumption of foliage by herbivores, this measurement excludes leaf production that is consumed by herbivores.

variable.name: ANPP_litterfall_1_OM
description: Anuall litterfall, including leaves, twigs, and reproductive structures
notes: Non-required covariate max.diameter_twig indicates maximum twig diameter classified as litterfall.

variable.name: ANPP_litterfall_1_C
description: Anuall litterfall, including leaves, twigs, and reproductive structures
notes: Non-required covariate max.diameter_twig indicates maximum twig diameter classified as litterfall.

variable.name: ANPP_litterfall_2_OM
description: Annual litterfall, including leaves, twigs, reproductive structures, and small branches/ wood/ large twigs
equations: ANPP_litterfall_2_OM = ANPP_litterfall_1_OM + ( ANPP_small branches/ large twigs_OM)
notes: Non-required covariate max.diameter_branch indicates maximum branch diameter classified as litterfall.

variable.name: ANPP_litterfall_2_C
description: Annual litterfall, including leaves, twigs, reproductive structures, and small branches/ wood/ large twigs
equations: ANPP_litterfall_2_C = ANPP_litterfall_1_C + ( ANPP_small branches/ large twigs_C)
notes: Non-required covariate max.diameter_branch indicates maximum branch diameter classified as litterfall.

variable.name: ANPP_litterfall_3_OM
description: Annual litterfall- components included not specified.

variable.name: ANPP_litterfall_3_C
description: Annual litterfall- components included not specified.

variable.name: ANPP_repro_OM
description: Annual allocation of NPP to reproductive structures (fruits, flowers, seeds)

variable.name: ANPP_repro_C
description: Annual allocation of NPP to reproductive structures (fruits, flowers, seeds)

variable.name: ANPP_folivory_OM
description: Annual leaf consumption by herbivores, defined here as a direct component of ANPP (as opposed to a component of ANPP_foliage_OM)*.
equations: ANPP_folivory_OM = (total leaf production_OM) - ANPP_foliage_OM + (change in biomass_ag_foliage_OM)
notes: *We define ANPP_folivory_OM as a direct component of ANPP (as opposed to a component of ANPP_foliage_OM) because common measurement methods of ANPP_foliage_OM do not account for ANPP_folivory_OM.

variable.name: ANPP_folivory_C
description: Annual leaf consumption by herbivores, defined here as a direct component of ANPP (as opposed to a component of ANPP_foliage_C)*.
equations: ANPP_folivory_C = (total leaf production_C) - ANPP_foliage_C + (change in biomass_ag_foliage_C)
notes: *We define ANPP_folivory_C as a direct component of ANPP (as opposed to a component of ANPP_foliage_C) because common measurement methods of ANPP_foliage_C do not account for ANPP_folivory_C.

variable.name: woody.mortality_ag_OM
description: Annual biomass mortality--i.e., total aboveground biomass of tree stems that die.

variable.name: woody.mortality_ag_C
description: Total aboveground C of tree stems that die annually.

variable.name: delta.agb_OM
description: Net change in aboveground live biomass

variable.name: delta.agb_C
description: Net change in aboveground live biomass C

variable.name: BNPP_root_OM
description: Annual root biomass production determined by repeated soil coring, isotopic estimates of fine-root turnover combined with biomass measurements, root ingrowth cores, root ingrowth mesh, upscaled root-length production observed in minirhizotrons or the soil respiration and litterfall constraint formulated by Raich & Nadelhoffer (1989)

variable.name: BNPP_root_C
description: Annual root production determined by repeated soil coring, isotopic estimates of fine-root turnover combined with biomass measurements, root ingrowth cores, root ingrowth mesh, upscaled root-length production observed in minirhizotrons or the soil respiration and litterfall constraint formulated by Raich & Nadelhoffer (1989)

variable.name: BNPP_root_coarse_OM
description: Annual coarse root production, typically determined using allometric equations relating root mass to stem diameter.

variable.name: BNPP_root_coarse_C
description: Annual coarse root production, typically determined using allometric equations relating root mass to stem diameter.

variable.name: BNPP_root_fine_OM
description: Annual fine root production, estimated using a variety of methods including minirhizotrons, repeat coring, and ingrowth cores.

variable.name: BNPP_root_fine_C
description: Annual fine root production, estimated using a variety of methods including minirhizotrons, repeat coring, and ingrowth cores.

variable.name: R_eco_C
description: Annual ecosystem respiration,commonly estimated through flux partitioning of eddy covariance. Sign convention: positive.
equations: (1)* R_eco_C = NEE_C - GPP_C; (2) R_eco_C = R_auto_C + R_soil_het_C
notes: *Equation 1 assumes minimal vertical advection, respiration-derived dissolved inorganic carbon, and non-repiratory CO2 fluxes (e.g., from fire or ultraviolet oxidation of organic matter); see Chapin et al. 2006

variable.name: R_eco_cum_C
description: Cumulative ecosystem respiration over a specified time frame (measured using eddy-covariance or gas exchange in a closed chamber). Sign convention: positive.
notes: Applies to timeframes other than one year. Meaninful only in conjunction with start and end date.

variable.name: R_auto_C
description: Annual autotrophic respiration, including above- and belowground components.
notes: Covariates will depend on methodology. Currently not acquired for any records in the database.

variable.name: R_auto_ag_C
description: Annual aboveground autotrophic respiration
notes: Covariates will depend on methodology. Currently not acquired for any records in the database.

variable.name: R_auto_wood_C
description: Annual aboveground respiration of woody stems

variable.name: R_auto_foliage_C
description: Annual foliar respiration

variable.name: R_auto_root_C
description: Annual root respiration (all size classes). Note methodology: root gas exchange/ root exclusion/ isotopes
notes: If estimated through direct measurement of root gas exchange, covariates should include depth; min.diameter_root; max.diameter_root

variable.name: R_soil_het_C
description: Annual soil heterotrophic respiration

variable.name: R_soil_C
description: Annual soil respiration

variable.name: total.ecosystem_C
description: Includes total biomass, deadwood, organic layer, and soil organic C

variable.name: total.ecosystem_2_C
description: Total ecosystem carbon in organic matter, including total biomass, deadwood, and organic layer but excluding soil organic carbon.

variable.name: biomass_OM
description: Total live biomass.

variable.name: biomass_C
description: Total carbon in live biomass.

variable.name: biomass_ag_OM
description: Total aboveground live biomass. May include biomass of reproductive structures and understory biomass, if data are available. Dead wood excluded.

variable.name: biomass_ag_C
description: Total carbon in aboveground live biomass. May include biomass of reproductive structures and understory biomass, if data are available. Dead wood excluded.

variable.name: biomass_ag_woody_OM
description: Total aboveground structural (stem + branch) biomass

variable.name: biomass_ag_woody_C
description: Total carbon in aboveground structural (stem + branch) biomass

variable.name: biomass_ag_foliage_OM
description: Total foliage biomass

variable.name: biomass_ag_foliage_C
description: Total carbon in foliage biomass

variable.name: biomass_root_OM
description: Total root biomass

variable.name: biomass_root_C
description: Total carbon in root biomass

variable.name: biomass_root_coarse_OM
description: Total coarse root biomass. Typical size cutoff (min.diameter_root) is 1-2 mm diameter, with preference given to min.diameter_root = 1 mm when there is an option.

variable.name: biomass_root_coarse_C
description: Total carbon in coarse root biomass. Typical size cutoff (min.diameter_root) is 1-2 mm diameter, with preference given to min.diameter_root = 1 mm when there is an option.

variable.name: biomass_root_fine_OM
description: Total fine root biomass. Typical size cutoff (max.diameter_root) is 1-2 mm diameter, with preference given to max.diameter_root = 1 mm when there is an option.

variable.name: biomass_root_fine_C
description: Total carbon in fine root biomass. Typical size cutoff (max.diameter_root) is 1-2 mm diameter, with preference given to max.diameter_root = 1 mm when there is an option.

variable.name: deadwood_OM
description: Total mass of aboveground dead wood, including standing dead wood and coarse woody debris
notes: Covariates depend on methodology. Include min.diameter, min.length, allometric.equation.

variable.name: deadwood_C
description: Total carbon in aboveground dead wood, including standing dead wood and coarse woody debris
notes: Covariates depend on methodology. Include min.diameter, min.length, allometric.equation.

variable.name: deadwood_standing_OM
description: Total mass of aboveground standing dead wood (snags)
notes: Covariates depend on methodology. Include min.diameter, min.length, allometric.equation.

variable.name: deadwood_standing_C
description: Total carbon in aboveground standing dead wood (snags)
notes: Covariates depend on methodology. Include min.diameter, min.length, allometric.equation.

variable.name: deadwood_down_OM
description: Total mass of downed dead wood (coarse woody debris)
notes: Covariates depend on methodology. Include min.diameter, min.length.

variable.name: deadwood_down_C
description: Total carbon in downed dead wood (coarse woody debris)
notes: Covariates depend on methodology. Include min.diameter, min.length.

variable.name: organic.layer_OM
description: Mass of litter/ organic layer/ forest floor

variable.name: organic.layer_C
description: Carbon in litter/ organic layer/ forest floor

variable.name: soil_OM
description: Soil organic matter to specified depth in mineral soil
notes: depth refers to depth in mineral soil.

variable.name: soil_C
description: Soil organic carbon to specified depth in mineral soil
notes: depth refers to depth in mineral soil.
